content:
I'd love to discuss what I'm working on with people, so I'll also start sharing here.

  • I am working on categorifying Adams operations as a sequel to my Schur functors paper with @John Baez and @Todd Trimble. I'm basically done with the theory, and now the hard part: examples.
  • With Derek Lowenberg, I'm working out some general methods for constructing categories which admit a notion of "representation stability".
  • Jonathan Beardsley and I are trying to deloop hyperalgebraic structures, hopefully building a connection between F1\mathbb F_1F1â€‹ and directed homotopy.
  • I'm participating in the compositional thermostatics project with @John Baez and @Owen Lynch. Hoping to dig more into it soon.
  • Sadaf Kadir, Ethan Kowalenko and I are working on (yet another) diagrammatic language for rig cats/bimonoidal cats/2-rigs. Our motivating problem was working through the details of proving that you can take direct sums of Frobenius algebras, but we'd like to include something more novel to compute. I would really love suggestions here.
